features: Every Purchase Saves Pets. BISSELL proudly supports BISSELL Pet Foundation and its mission to help save homeless pets..600.0 watts
Powerful Motorized Brush Roll. Brush roll and powerful suction work great for quick and easy cleaning on multiple surfaces, including carpet, bare floors, stairs and upholstery.
3-in-1 Versatility. Use as a traditional stick vacuum, remove the foot for a high reach vacuum or use the Quick Release Handle to easily convert into a hand vacuum.
Lightweight & Easy to Carry. Weighing less than 4 lbs, its lightweight design makes it easy to pick up and carry around your home.
Tools Included. Crevice tool included for vacuuming hard-to-reach spaces and messes.
body.description: BISSELL® Featherweight™ PowerBrush is a 3-in-1 ultra-lightweight corded stick vacuum that’s great for quick and effective multi-surface cleaning. With its powerful motorized brush roll, Featherweight™ PowerBrush can be used as a lightweight stick vacuum for speedy cleaning across multiple surfaces, including carpet, area rugs and hard floors. Use the Quick Release Handle to easily convert the machine into a hand vacuum for cleaning above floor surfaces with the crevice tool, or keep the foot on the hand vacuum for cleaning stairs. This ultra-lightweight machine weighs less than 4 lbs, making it is easy to use and light enough to carry around your home. Plus, it easily stores when you’re done cleaning. BISSELL proudly supports BISSELL Pet Foundation® and its mission to help save homeless pets. When you buy a BISSELL product, you help save pets, too. We’re proud to design products that help make pet messes, odors and pet homelessness disappear.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ultralight Stick Vacuum for Quick Multi-Surface Cleaning
3-in-1 Versatility Easily converts to hand vac with the Quick Release Handle. Leave the foot on the hand vacuum for cleaning stairs or remove the foot for upholstery and above floor surfaces.

Multiple Ways to Clean Ultra Lightweight Stick Vac Powerful motorized brush roll cleans on hard floor, carpet and area rugs. Hand Vacuum Easily converts into hand vacuum with or without the included crevice tool. High Reach Vacuum Clean hard-to-reach spaces with an extended reach. Stair Vac Quick Release Handle easily removes to use as a stair vacuum.
No-fuss Maintenance Easy Cord Storage Easily store the cord on the Quick Release Cord Wrap. Washable Filter The Easy Empty Dirt Bin and washable filter make cleanup after the clean up a breeze!
Self-standing for simple storage and grab and go convenience

Every Purchase Saves Pets BISSELL proudly supports BISSELL Pet Foundation and its mission to help save homeless pets. When you buy a BISSELL product, you help save pets, too. We’re proud to design products that help make pet messes, odors and pet homelessness disappear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Bissell Featherweight Powerbrush Stick Vacuum (Model #2773A)
reviews.reviewText: This was easy to assemble. The suction is amazing. It is light and easy to maneuver. Removing the filter for emptying and/or cleaning is easy. Because I live in a two-story house and I like it so much, I purchased a second one so I could have one upstairs and one downstairs. The second one was delivered today -- a day ahead of schedule. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice little vacuum.
reviews.reviewText: Nice and light little vacuum that works well. And I found that the older it is, the better It works. cause the bristles start to fanning out and picks up even more. If this is what you're after you will be satisfied. Fairly long cord also. No complaints here, very satisfied

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So far, very nice and seems to be performing well. Added a few more nice to have features.
reviews.reviewText: I only had this nice vacuum a few days and used it once on my hardware floors and 8 X 10 carpets. Will probably give it 5 stars in my next review (too soon for that rating) and do have a few recommendations so far. It's not a heavy-duty vacuum and purchased it for something quick and easy to use for everyday light cleaning (I do have a heavy-duty vacuum also for heavier vacuuming once in a while).The vacuum is light, easy to set up, seems sturdy, can stand by itself against the wall, excellent 18 ft. electric cord, and good suction power on both hardwood and small carpets - exactly what I was hoping for. The brush turns nicely by motor power, not by air pressure as some models do. The following recommendations are minor, nice to have in future versions and not meant to be-little this so far nice vacuum:1. Would be nice to have an additional button to turn on-off the brush (might help picking up matter from the hardwood floors but up to Bissell engineers to test this feature).2. The vacuum handle is very smooth and allows the vacuum to twist in your hand easily. It would be nice to roughen this up a little so you have a little firmer grip that would help keep it from twisting left or right in your hand. Not a big deal but nice to have and should be an easy enhancement.3. It would be nice to have a way to attach the Crevice tool (included for vacuuming hard-to-reach spaces and messes) to the vacuum when not in use. The Crevice tool comes with the vacuum but sometimes I can't remember where I left it from my last use of it. A quick plastic hook or catch on the handle would be nice, where it becomes part of the vacuum you carry around. As a temporary measure, I attached a piece of Velcro to the lower part of the long handle and a piece to one of the back sides of the Crevice tool and that seems to work fine (always know where I put it last). I am sure the Bissell engineers can find a little better solution. Should be an easy enhancement.4. In addition to the Crevice tool, it would be nice to have a little brush attachment to vacuum furniture, for cat hair, etc. Not a big deal either but nice to have.5. Would be nice to be able to hang on a closet wall. Could we please have some small plastic wall hanger, that can be screwed onto the wall to enable it to be hung from the wall. Doesn't need to be much of a hanger and not everybody would need or want it, but a nice, inexpensive addition for the unit.6. Would be nice if the revolving brush mechnesim would swivel left and right. I had used this feature on a previous vacuum and loved it as I could reach awkard areas.7. I still can't give this vacuum five stars as it could use more suction power. It does clean but I never feel the floors are really that clean. A little more suction power would be really nice but I guess that would compete with your more expensive vacuums. I purchased this vs. a cordless for the purpose of getting more power and of course use time. Unfortunately, power wise, it is comparable to an inexpensive cordless. Having used this now, and it does do a fair job, I would have returned it and reconsidered a cordless but my return policy has expired.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it, it's awesome!
reviews.reviewText: After surviving 2 IRobots I decided I am not putting anymore money into them. My 690 required repair so I went ahead and tried this product. i cannot say enough! My slider tracks are now dust free and my cats raised bed is fur free. I am loving how easy it is to use and for me, the fact that it is lightweight adds to the 5 star review. Great suction!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Brush is purely cosmetic, difficult to use on carpet.
reviews.reviewText: This thing is great on stairs when you are not using the plastic attachment. It is super light weight and has great suction. It is not so great on carpets. It barely wants to roll, so you are constantly fighting it, even on fairly solid carpets it wants to get stuck . The brush does not rotate at all; it is just there for looks and nothing more.However, I think the low price and the suction power help to salvage it, so I give it a 3 out of 5 review. It will get the job done, just don't expect it to gracefully glide around your floors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great and it's a two for one.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my son's RV but I tried it out first. Great suction and easy to use. I like the idea that's a hand vacuum too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Not sure how it works, because I ordered one that was purported to be "like new, but the package was damaged." Whoever returned it, returned it broken (dust cup isn't held in place) and nobody checked it before sending it out again. So it's going back, even though it's broken. I offered to just throw it away here and save the return shipping, as well as someone's time to check it for damage--although that probably wouldn't happen anyway, now that I see how returns are handled. They said to send it back anyhow. Go figure.But FYI, the entire unit is plastic. Maybe it's lightweight that way, but it seems flimsy and fragile. Also loud, because I turned it on for a moment to note the amount of sound it made. Personally, I'd spend a few more dollars and try for better quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You will never need a broom again!!
reviews.reviewText: I just received this today. I vacuumed my whole house which is all hardwood floors. The amount of debris it picked up was insane. This was quick and it didn’t spit any debris out of the vacuum. This is my floor cleaning dream come true! Just note that this is not great on rugs. If you need to use it on a rug, it’s best to just push it forward for quick pick ups.
Great stick vacuum for the price! Light, good suction, easy-to-use.
